About

Computer Science Bachelor, Full Stack Web Developer using MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js (MERN), also Frontend Dev with HTML, CSS & JavaScript as well as SEO & Video Editing.

I have genuine love in learning and I'm always seeking to leverage my skills in order to better understand all aspects of new and upcoming technologies to develop apps with value, quality and purpose.
